hotels.vendor_name: Omni Scottsdale Resort & Spa at Montelucia
hotels.title: Spanish-Inspired Scottsdale Retreat with Three Resort Pools, Day Spa & Five Restaurants
hotels.description: Escape to a five-star oasis framed by the majestic Camelback Mountain, ideally positioned between Scottsdale and Phoenix. Savour Spanish tapas at Prado, sip a handcrafted cocktail at Mbar or indulge in holistic treatments at Joya Spa. For the adventurous, nearby hiking trails beckon, while the resort's three sparkling pools provide a refreshing respite from the Arizona heat. Venture beyond the resort to explore Scottsdale's vibrant arts district, upscale shopping centres and renowned golf courses. For a taste of local culture, visit the nearby Musical Instrument Museum or the Desert Botanical Garden.
